subject: resource/In_convertendo_Dominus_(Rameau)
object: In convertendo Dominus (When the Lord turned [the captivity of Zion]), sometimes referred to as In convertendo, is a setting by Jean-Philippe Rameau of In convertendo Dominus, the Latin version of Psalm 126, (thus numbered in the King James Bible, number 125 in the Latin psalters). It is listed as RCT 14 in the Rameau Catalogue Thématique of Sylvie Bouissou and Denis Herlin.
human_readable: In convertendo Dominus (When the Lord turned [the captivity of Zion]) by Jean-Philippe Rameau is an abstract setting.
